LanguageData.CP_Combat.label: Telekinetic
LanguageData.CP_Combat.description: Telekinetics shape the raw ambient mana itself into powerful kinetic attacks.
LanguageData.CP_Combat.tooltip: Telekinetics are a purely offensive focused mage displine that perfect the very basic art of moulding raw mana into a lethal magical weapon. Highly skilled Telekinetics can even manipulate raw mana to experience pressure from afar.
